data.title: Business Technology Managed.
data.meta_description: Gordon Flesch Company offers print management services, UCAAS, managed IT, commercial printers, copiers and other technology in WI, IL, IN, IA, OH and SD.
data.text:
So, you like options? Gordon Flesch Company has lots of them. As the nation’s largest Canon dealer and provider of other quality brands like Ricoh and Lexmark, practically any size business with any size budget can get the printers they need, along with expert technicians to back them up.

Does your IT team struggle to keep up with everything on their plates? Do printer-related help desk tickets get in your way? Gordon Flesch Company (GFC) can remove the stress of updating, maintaining or repairing your printers so your team can get back to doing what they do best.

Feeling disconnected from your coworkers and customers? Traditional phone systems no longer support the myriad ways people prefer to interact in today’s remote landscape. Bring people together with Managed Voice Services featuring a tailored multi-channel unified communications solution.

Not a technical genius? Good thing for you, we’ve got an entire team who thrives on solving the toughest IT challenges your business can throw at them. Whether you need enterprise-level software, hardware, data security and IT infrastructure, or you’ve just decided your office needs a little technical support, we’re here to help.
